src:
Raymond K. "Rocky" Brager

03 Nov 2019, 18:30

LODI - Raymond K. "Rocky" Brager, age 88, of Lodi, passed away peacefully on Saturday, Nov. 2, 2019 at Sauk Praire Health Care.
Funeral arrangements are pending.
A full obituary will be published at a later date. Online condolences may be made at www.gundersonfh.com.
